mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_subject ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, name, type, parent_id, logo, price, start_date, end_date, state, category_id, pre_amount, codex, details, region_ids, weight) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{name}, #{type}, 0, #{logo}, #{price}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, 'WAIT', #{categoryId}, #{preAmount}, #{codex}, #{details}, #{regionIds}, #{weight});
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, name, type, parent_id AS parentId, logo, price, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, state, category_id AS categoryId, pre_amount AS preAmount, codex, details, region_ids AS regionIds, weight FROM tb_subject WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, name, type, parent_id, logo, price, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, state, category_id AS categoryId, pre_amount AS preAmount, codex, details, region_ids AS regionIds, weight FROM tb_subject ORDER BY weight DESC LIMIT 1;
